articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Portugal man accidentally uncovers a 25-metre-long dinosaur skeleton in his own backyard - ABC News
articles.description: Palaeontologists believe the discovery could be the remains of the largest sauropod dinosaur to be found in Europe.
articles.content: A 25-metre fossilised dinosaur skeleton was the last thing a Portugal man expected to uncover in his own backyard in 2017, but now researchers believe he may have stumbled upon the largest of its kin… [+1694 chars]

articles.title: Combination 'polypill' lowers the risk of major cardiovascular events, study finds - CNN
